title: Phase 1: MVP - Working Directory
description: Build the minimum viable product with manual resource entry, basic search, and admin review queue.
notes:
prepared.skills: fastapi CRUD, sqlmodel queries, next.js app-router, shadcn/ui components, postgresql full-text search
prepared.files: backend/app/api/v1/resources.py, backend/app/api/v1/search.py, backend/app/api/v1/admin.py, backend/app/models/resource.py, frontend/src/app/page.tsx, frontend/package.json
prepared.agents:
  - api-scaffolding:fastapi-pro (CRUD endpoints, async SQLModel)
  - database-design:sql-pro (PostgreSQL FTS, GIN indexes)
  - frontend-development:frontend-expert (Next.js 15, React 19 orchestrator)
  - frontend-mobile-development:frontend-developer (React components, App Router)
prepared.prompt: |
  Complete Phase 1: MVP - Working Directory for Vibe4Vets

  ## Context
  Build the minimum viable product - manual resource CRUD, search, and admin review.
  Stack: FastAPI + SQLModel + PostgreSQL (FTS) + Next.js 15 + shadcn/ui

  ## Child Tasks (blocked by this epic)
  - V4V-yvh: Implement Resource CRUD API (depends on Alembic too)
  - V4V-ikq: Implement full-text search (depends on Alembic too)
  - V4V-av2: Build search UI with filters
  - V4V-5dl: Build resource detail page
  - V4V-aqa: Build admin review queue
  - V4V-cx0: Implement trust scoring service
  - V4V-ul2: Seed initial resources manually

  ## Spawn These Agents (via Task tool)
  - Task(subagent_type: "api-scaffolding:fastapi-pro") - CRUD endpoints, async SQLModel queries
  - Task(subagent_type: "database-design:sql-pro") - PostgreSQL full-text search, GIN indexes
  - Task(subagent_type: "frontend-development:frontend-expert") - Orchestrates React/Next.js work
  - Task(subagent_type: "frontend-mobile-development:frontend-developer") - React 19, Next.js 15 components

  ## Activate These Skills
  - /ui-styling:ui-styling - shadcn/ui components, Tailwind CSS 4, Radix primitives
  - /backend-development:backend-development - API patterns, testing strategies
  - /docs-seeker:docs-seeker - Fetch latest Next.js 15, React 19 docs via context7

  ## Key Files to Review
  - backend/app/api/v1/resources.py - Resource CRUD stubs
  - backend/app/api/v1/search.py - Search endpoint stub
  - backend/app/api/v1/admin.py - Admin endpoints stub
  - backend/app/models/resource.py - Resource SQLModel
  - frontend/src/app/page.tsx - Landing page

  ## MCP Tools Available
  - shadcn/* - Search/install shadcn components (table, form, dialog, card)
  - context7/query-docs - Get latest Next.js 15, React 19, FastAPI docs
  - codex/codex - Get second opinion on API design

  ## Acceptance Criteria
  1. CRUD API for resources with pagination
  2. Full-text search with category/state filters
  3. Search results UI with responsive grid
  4. Resource detail page with trust signals
  5. Admin review queue with approve/reject
  6. 10-20 seed resources from official sources

  ## When Done
  Run: /conductor:bdw-worker-done V4V-2g0
complexity: L
close_reason: Phase 1 MVP complete: CRUD API, FTS search, trust scoring, admin review, shadcn/ui frontend, seed data script

title: Phase 0: Project Scaffolding
description: Set up the foundational structure for Vibe4Vets - Docker, database schema, CI/CD, and connector interface.
notes:
prepared.skills: docker-compose, alembic migrations, github-actions CI, fastapi backend, postgresql pgvector

  - database-migrations:database-admin (PostgreSQL, pgvector setup)

prepared.prompt: |
  Complete Phase 0: Project Scaffolding for Vibe4Vets

  ## Context
  This epic sets up foundational infrastructure for a veteran resource directory.
  Stack: FastAPI + SQLModel + PostgreSQL (pgvector) + Next.js 15 + Tailwind + shadcn/ui

  ## Child Tasks (blocked by this epic)
  - V4V-0mz: Configure Docker Compose for local dev
  - V4V-kma: Set up Alembic migrations
  - V4V-ari: Set up GitHub Actions CI
  - V4V-wya: Add core taxonomy definitions

  ## Spawn These Agents (via Task tool)
  - Task(subagent_type: "api-scaffolding:fastapi-pro") - FastAPI async patterns, SQLModel integration
  - Task(subagent_type: "database-migrations:database-admin") - PostgreSQL setup, Alembic migrations
  - Task(subagent_type: "cicd-automation:deployment-engineer") - GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
  - Task(subagent_type: "python-development:python-pro") - Python 3.12 best practices, uv/ruff

  ## Activate These Skills
  - /backend-development:backend-development - PostgreSQL, Docker, testing patterns
  - /database-migrations:sql-migrations - Alembic setup, zero-downtime migrations

  ## Key Files to Review
  - docker-compose.yml - Docker services (pgvector, backend, frontend)
  - backend/pyproject.toml - Python deps (SQLModel, Alembic, FastAPI)
  - backend/app/database.py - SQLModel engine setup
  - backend/app/models/__init__.py - All model exports
  - backend/connectors/base.py - Connector protocol interface

  ## MCP Tools Available
  - context7/query-docs - Get latest FastAPI, SQLModel, Alembic docs
  - codex/codex - Get second opinion on architecture decisions

  ## Acceptance Criteria
  1. Docker Compose brings up all services (db, backend, frontend)
  2. Alembic migrations created for all models
  3. Backend connects to pgvector database
  4. Basic CI workflow runs lint/type-check/tests
  5. Core taxonomy constants defined

  ## When Done
  Run: /conductor:bdw-worker-done V4V-al5
complexity: L
close_reason: Phase 0 scaffolding complete: Docker Compose with pgvector, Alembic migrations, GitHub Actions CI, and core taxonomy.

title: Build admin review queue
description: Create /admin/review page with: pending resources list, approve/reject actions, notes field. Add basic auth protection.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation

title: Set up GitHub Actions CI
description: Create CI workflow: lint (ruff), type check (mypy), tests (pytest). Add frontend checks: eslint, tsc.
close_reason: GitHub Actions CI workflow created with backend lint/type-check/test jobs and frontend lint/build jobs.

title: Build search UI with filters
description: Create search page with: search bar, category filters, state dropdown, results grid. Use shadcn components. Mobile responsive.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation

title: Implement trust scoring service
description: Create backend/app/services/trust.py with: calculate_trust_score(), detect_risky_change(), freshness decay logic. Add tests.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation

title: Implement DOL/CareerOneStop Connector
description: Create a connector for Department of Labor CareerOneStop API (https://www.careeronestop.org/Developers/WebAPI/web-api.aspx). This provides employment and training resources for veterans.
design:
1. Create backend/connectors/dol_careeronestop.py implementing Connector protocol
2. Define metadata() returning SourceMetadata with tier=1, reliability=1.0
3. Implement run() to fetch from CareerOneStop API
4. Map API responses to ResourceCandidate with category=employment|training
5. Add tests in backend/tests/connectors/test_dol_careeronestop.py
acceptance_criteria:
- Connector implements full Connector protocol
- Fetches job resources and training programs
- Properly categorizes as employment or training
- Has >80% test coverage
- Respects API rate limits

title: Build ETL Pipeline
description: Create the ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) pipeline to process data from connectors. This normalizes, deduplicates, and enriches resources before storing them.
design:
1. Create backend/etl/pipeline.py as main orchestrator
2. Implement normalize step (backend/etl/normalize.py) - standardize fields
3. Implement dedupe step (backend/etl/dedupe.py) - detect duplicates across sources
4. Implement enrich step (backend/etl/enrich.py) - add geocoding, trust scores
5. Pipeline should: run connectors → normalize → dedupe → enrich → store
6. Store raw data in SourceRecord for audit trail
acceptance_criteria:
- Pipeline processes multiple connectors in sequence
- Deduplication detects same resource from different sources
- Enrichment adds geocoding and computes trust scores
- Raw data preserved in SourceRecord with content hash
- Pipeline is idempotent (re-running produces same results)

title: Build Source Health Dashboard
description: Create admin dashboard showing health of all data sources. Should display last refresh time, error rates, and resource counts per source.
design:
1. Backend: Add GET /api/v1/admin/sources/health endpoint
2. Return per-source: name, tier, last_refresh, error_count, resource_count, status
3. Frontend: Create frontend/src/app/admin/sources/page.tsx
4. Show table with source health indicators (green/yellow/red)
5. Add charts for refresh history and error trends
6. Alert indicators when source is stale or failing
acceptance_criteria:
- Dashboard shows all registered sources
- Color-coded health status (green=healthy, yellow=stale, red=failing)
- Click source to see detailed history
- Auto-refreshes every 30 seconds
- Accessible only to admin users

title: Implement full-text search
description: Add Postgres full-text search to search.py endpoint. Create GIN index on resources. Support filtering by category, state, scope.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation

title: Set up Alembic migrations
description: Initialize Alembic for database migrations. Create initial migration for all models (Organization, Location, Resource, Source, SourceRecord, ReviewState, ChangeLog). Add pgvector extension.
close_reason: Alembic initialized with env.py, script template, and 001_initial_schema migration covering all models with pgvector extension.

title: Phase 2: Automation Epic
description: Epic for Phase 2 automation features including data connectors, ETL pipeline, scheduled refresh, and source health monitoring.

title: Implement Scheduled Refresh
description: Create background job system to automatically refresh resources on a schedule. Resources should be re-verified periodically to maintain freshness scores.
design:
1. Create backend/jobs/scheduler.py using APScheduler or similar
2. Define refresh intervals per source tier (Tier 1: daily, Tier 2: weekly, etc.)
3. Create backend/jobs/refresh_job.py to run ETL pipeline
4. Track last_refreshed timestamp per source
5. Update trust scores based on freshness decay
6. Add health endpoint to check scheduler status
acceptance_criteria:
- Scheduler runs in background with configurable intervals
- Different source tiers have appropriate refresh frequencies
- Trust scores decay over time without refresh
- Scheduler survives restarts (stores state)
- Monitoring endpoint shows next scheduled runs

title: Seed initial resources manually
description: Add 10-20 verified resources across categories: 5 employment, 5 housing, 5 training, 5 legal. Use official VA/DOL sources.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation

title: Implement VA.gov Connector
description: Create a connector to fetch veteran resources from VA.gov. Should implement the Connector protocol defined in backend/connectors/base.py. Target VA Developer API (https://developer.va.gov/) for facilities and services data.
design:
1. Create backend/connectors/va_gov.py implementing Connector protocol
2. Define metadata() returning SourceMetadata with tier=1, reliability=1.0
3. Implement run() to fetch from VA Developer API
4. Return list[ResourceCandidate] with employment/housing resources
5. Add tests in backend/tests/connectors/test_va_gov.py
acceptance_criteria:
- Connector implements full Connector protocol
- Fetches real data from VA.gov API
- Returns properly formatted ResourceCandidate objects
- Has >80% test coverage
- Handles rate limiting and errors gracefully

title: Add core taxonomy definitions
description: Create backend/app/core/taxonomy.py with CATEGORIES, SUBCATEGORIES, and helper functions. Define: employment, training, housing, legal with subcategories.
close_reason: Created backend/app/core/taxonomy.py with CATEGORIES, SUBCATEGORIES, SOURCE_TIERS, and helper functions.

title: Implement Resource CRUD API
description: Complete the resources.py endpoints: list with pagination/filtering, get by ID, create, update, delete. Add Pydantic schemas for request/response.
close_reason: Completed as part of Phase 1 MVP implementation
